settings.text2: "This has been a game-changer for me! I used to get salon treatments, but this is so much more convenient. Not to mention it’s saving me a ton of money!"
"I didn’t expect results this fast! After just a few treatments, I can see a huge difference in my underarm hair growth. So glad I invested in this."
"I was worried it might sting, but it doesn’t hurt at all! I’ve used it for a few weeks now, and I’m already seeing less regrowth."
"I decided to trust the hype, and I’m glad I did—this is the best money I've ever spent! My hair was gone after just a few weeks. It doesn’t hurt, and it's super easy to use."
"Honestly, I was skeptical at first, but I’m so glad I tried it! My skin is smooth, and there’s barely any regrowth. Worth every penny."
"Wasn’t sure if it would work on my beard, but it’s actually thinning out the hair nicely! Great for keeping things clean and reducing shaving time."
"I’ve always been self-conscious about my upper lip hair, and this has been a lifesaver! After a few sessions, the hair is barely noticeable."
"Super easy to use and really effective! After a few weeks, I barely have any hair growing back on my legs. My skin feels smoother than ever."

settings.text: Chief Scientific Advisor of Ulike Group
settings.text2: “I am to merge the most important findings in photomedicine research with Ulike’s research and development capabilities to attain industry breakthroughs with advanced beauty products.”

settings.text1: Ultraviolet protection for hygienic full-body use and germ-free sharing.
Hypoallergenic blade to prepare your skin for optimal IPL results.

settings.text2: Granted Patents
IPL Research
Products Sold

settings.des: Source: Frost & Sullivan, confirmed based on research on global hair removal device market and calculated by global sales volume between 2022 and 2024. Hair removal device refers to a instrument that targets hair follicles using technologies such as lasers and intense pulsed light (IPL), with the aim of reducing or removing hair. The survey was completed in February 2025.

settings.text1: Fast delivery from the nearest warehouse.
settings.text2: We offer free domestic shipping (2-5 days), next-day delivery, and international shipping options, along with real-time tracking updates to keep you informed.

settings.text1: You can return your order for a full refund.
settings.text2: Not sure you'll love it? No worries! Enjoy free returns or exchanges within 100 days of purchase, as long as the product is in its original condition with all accessories included.

settings.text1: Ulike devices are covered for a period of 2 years.
settings.text2: We stand behind the quality of our products. Enjoy a two-year limited warranty on any Ulike device purchased directly from our official website or authorized sellers, including free repair or replacement for defective devices.

settings.text1: Enjoy peace of mind with our round-the-clock support.
settings.text2: Click the chat bubble to chat with us, email uk.support@ulikeglobal.com, or call +44 808 812 6880, Monday to Friday, from 9 AM to 7 PM.

settings.text1: Shop with ease thanks to our flexible payment options.
settings.text2: Choose PayPal, Klarna, or Clearpay: Clearpay offers up to 4 months interest-free financing, PayPal and Klarna lets you pay in 30 days, and all three allow 3 interest-free installments.
